item.title: General Motors beats Wall Street estimates, reassesses full-year guidance amid auto tariffs
item.description: GM beat expectations but is reassessing its 2025 guidance and suspending any additional stock buybacks amid expected cost increases and industry uncer...

item.title: PayPal reports first-quarter earnings beat, maintains forecast
item.description: PayPal reported better-than-expected earnings in the first quarter but missed on revenue.

item.title: Venmo revenue grows 20%, with debit card payment volume soaring
item.description: Venmo, long viewed as a business laggard for PayPal, is generating much faster revenue growth than the overall company.

item.title: Pfizer expands cost cuts, tops quarterly profit estimates even as sales fall
item.description: Pfizer maintained its 2025 guidance but noted it does not include any impact of tariffs or trade policy, "which we are unable to predict at this time....

item.title: Coke keeps full-year forecast, says it expects tariff disruptions to be 'manageable' after Pepsi cuts earnings outlook
item.description: Coke beat first-quarter earnings estimates, and unlike rival Pepsi, maintained its full-year outlook as it expects cost hikes from tariffs to be "mana...
